author: sdeboy
msg: Responsiveness value needed in default props to prevent number formatexception.

author: psmith
msg: centralised the exit process into a method, and ensured all points
of exit (file menu, hot key, closing window) call this method so that
Settings can be saved.
Also added the Responsives, and table column widths to the default
settings, and allowed them to be automatically saved as local settings
on exit.

author: psmith
msg: fixed a synchronization issue where if the ChainsawAppender starts
receiving events and wants to append them to the GUI before the
GUI is fully initialized, you can get some NPE's.
Added a initialization flag, and a monitor object for the events thread
to wait on, and check until the GUI initialization is complete, before
allowing the event thread to continue posting events to the GUI.
Also Jalopalized the file.

author: psmith
msg: oops, forgot that this interface should NOT extend from SettingsListener
even though it has similar named methods.  Would be too confusing
being able to pass a Profileable in to SettingsManager as a listener.

author: psmith
msg: The beginnings of the ProfileManager and it's effects. Currently the
default Table column order is now defined in the default.properties
file and will soon be loadable by distinct profiles for each LogPanel.
Work in Progress.
